item.title: Life in a Post as of July 2019
item.description: I wrote this to Dean Ramsden 10:03 Monday 22 July 2019 JST In the meantime, maybe write up your personal history and your goals for the work you want done, and Iâ€™ll study it ahead of time, so we can jump right in. When I was a child, my dad showed me how to use coat hangers as divining sticks to find water. At the time, I thought it was strange.
